job_title: Software QA Engineer - UI Frameworks, Vision Products Software
job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsBS or MS in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/relevant field or equivalent experience.
• More than 2 years of experience as a quality engineer in the software industry.
• Experience developing detailed test plans, assessing risks, filing detailed defect reports, and providing relevant data for test reporting.
• Proactive self-starter with a keen eye for details with focus on end-user experiences and ability to go above and beyond to ensure a high quality release.
• Ability to drive cross-functional communications, understanding dependencies while also ensuring a tight timeline can be maintained.
• Excellent knowledge of software development lifecycle, testing methodologies and strategies.
